about_the_game:
Sentenced to life in prison for your crimes, you’ve been given a rare and unexpected chance at freedom. The offer is simple but unsettling: participate in a highly experimental trial for a new drug designed to treat memory loss. In exchange, your sentence will be commuted. It’s an opportunity most would jump at, but nothing comes without a price.

The experiment seems straightforward. You’ll take the drug, enter an experiment room, and observe your surroundings. When you leave and return, you must identify what has changed and enter it into the computer system. Complete all three experiment rooms successfully, and you’ll earn your freedom.

But as the test progresses, the rooms begin to feel less like controlled environments and more like a nightmare. Is it the drug? The experiment? Or something more sinister lurking in the shadows?

Freedom is within your grasp, but can you trust your own mind to get you there?

  • Estimated Gameplay Time: Completion time varies, but the game is designed to be finished in approximately 1–2 hours.

  • Explore Three Unique Rooms: Each room offers a distinct environment filled with dozens of object anomalies and events to discover.

  • Deadly Threats: Encounter many dangerous threats, each requiring a specific strategy to overcome. Failing to respond correctly will result in death.

  • Survive or Restart: Failing to identify anomalies correctly will cost you lives. If you run out of lives, you’ll be killed and must restart from the beginning of the current room.

  • Room Progression: Successfully completing a room unlocks the next. To finish the game, you must unlock and complete all three rooms and face a final task.

  • Permanent Room Unlocks: Progression is permanent; once a room is unlocked, it remains accessible, allowing you to restart from that room without needing to replay previous sections.

  • Discover the Story: The deeper you progress, the more the story unfolds. Find hidden details throughout your play to fully reveal the truth behind the experiment.

  • Two Difficulty Modes:

    • Standard Difficulty: The intended gameplay experience.

    • Hard Difficulty: A significant challenge for those seeking a more intense experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains disturbing imagery, blood, violent acts and adult language.
